page.title: 02STOURBRIDGE SHOPPING CENTRE1
page.content: The Ryemarket Centre was opened in 1974.The two largest{shops}are Waitrose and Martins.Waitrose{ {supermarket}has its own multi-storey carpark for all shoppers in Stourbridge.Martins is a newsagents which also sells toys,books and records.Also there are branches of several large chain{stores}including Boots and Woolworths. The Centre which is the main area of {trade}has two covered arcades with shops on each side.Between the two arcades there is an open square.It has bench seats and shrubs in the middle. The Centre has a second open area which has a fountain and more seating. On Saturdays the Ryemarket is very busy.It is a popular meeting place for young people and buskers often perform there.
